data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I personally prefer to go out to eat at some famous restaurants, which have excellent environments. The following are my reasons. First of all, I am not good at cooking any kind of cuisine and I can hardly eat what I cook. However, there are plenty of tasty dishes at the restaurant so I can enjoy myself here. Secondly, I am very busy with my daily work and I always need to work from 9 am until 9 pm so eating at some famous restaurants is the best and most convenient choice for me. All in all, I prefer to go out to eat, especially at some well-known restaurants.
data.referenceText: Do you prefer to cook dinner at home or go out to eat why?
data.referenceTranslate: 你喜欢在家做饭还是出去吃为什么?
